edge: John Wick, a professional hitman and assassin, has gained a legendary reputation for his set of skills and is now hunted by the High Table, which is a powerful organization that governs criminal activities.
Caine, a blind High Table assassin and an old friend of Wick, is forced out of retirement to kill Wick to ensure the safety of his daughter at the request of the High Table.
The Marquis Vincent Bisset de Gramont, a powerful member of the High Table whose position is challenged by Wick, belongs to the High Table.
The Bowery King, a former underground crime boss who was left for dead by the High Table, is now sponsoring Wick and has an enmity with the High Table.
Shimazu Koji, the manager of the Osaka Continental Hotel, and his daughter Shimazu Akira, who is also a concierge at the hotel, are old friends of Wick and Caine.
Mr. Nobody / The Tracker, a bounty hunter pursuing Wick, is hunting Wick.
Charon, the concierge at the Continental Hotel in New York, works at the Continental Hotel.
Shimazu Akira, Koji's daughter and concierge of the Osaka Continental, works at the Osaka Continental Hotel.
Chidi, the second-in-command of the Marquis de Gramont, is subordinate to the Marquis Vincent Bisset de Gramont.
Killa Harkan, the head of the German Table, leads the German Table.
The Harbinger, a high-ranking operative of the High Table, belongs to the High Table.
Scott Adkins portrays Killa Harkan, the head of the German Table in John Wick: Chapter 3 – Parabellum.
Ian McShane portrays Winston Scott, the manager of the New York Continental Hotel and friend of Wick in John Wick: Chapter 3 – Parabellum.
Natalia Tena portrays Katia, Wick's adoptive sister in John Wick: Chapter 3 – Parabellum.
George Georgiou portrays the Elder, 'the one who sits above the Table' in John Wick: Chapter 3 – Parabellum. This is a different character than the one played by Saïd Taghmaoui in Parabellum (2019).
Clancy Brown portrays the Harbinger, a high-ranking operative of the High Table in John Wick: Chapter 3 – Parabellum.
Bridget Moynahan appears as Wick's late wife, Helen in John Wick: Chapter 3 – Parabellum via archive footage from the first film.
Sven Marquardt appears as a Ruska Roma member named Klaus in John Wick: Chapter 3 – Parabellum.
Retired sumo wrestlers Yoshinori Tashiro and Hishofuji Hiroki made appearances as the Osaka Continental gatekeepers in John Wick: Chapter 3 – Parabellum.
